tests.name: Correct Output Pt. 1
tests.run: cat test-files/test_output.txt test-files/test_exit.txt > test-files/cmd.txt; ./data_entry -c "Boring Names 777" -f "test-files/cmd.csv" < test-files/cmd.txt 2>&1 >/dev/null; diff test-files/cmd.csv test-files/test_output.csv

tests.name: Correct Output Pt. 2
tests.run: cat test-files/test_output2.txt test-files/test_exit.txt > test-files/cmd.txt; ./data_entry -c "Name ID Age" -f "test-files/cmd.csv" < test-files/cmd.txt 2>&1 >/dev/null; diff test-files/cmd.csv test-files/test_output2.csv

tests.name: Use of Threads
tests.run: cat test-files/test_threads.txt test-files/test_exit.txt > test-files/cmd.txt; strace >/dev/null -o out.trace ./data_entry -c "Emote Num1 Num2" -f "test-files/cmd.csv" < ./test-files/cmd.txt 2>&1 >/dev/null; cat out.trace |  grep "clone" | grep "CLONE_THREAD" | wc -l

tests.name: Threads Close Correctly
tests.run: cat test-files/test_threads.txt test-files/test_exit.txt > test-files/cmd.txt; strace >/dev/null -o out.trace ./data_entry -c "Emote Num1 Num2" -f "test-files/cmd.csv" < test-files/cmd.txt 2>&1 >/dev/null; cat out.trace | egrep "tgkill|tkill" | wc -l

tests.name: Memory Leakage
tests.run: cat test-files/test_output.txt test-files/test_exit.txt > test-files/cmd.txt; ./data_entry -c "Emote Num1 Num2" -f "test-files/cmd.csv" < test-files/cmd.txt 2>&1 >/dev/null
